name: Falcon-LogScale
description: Falcon LogScale is a log management platform that provides real-time log analysis, search, and visualization.

options.name: Falcon LogScale URL
options.description: The base URL for the Falcon LogScale Instance including the schema (i.e., https://)

options.name: Personal API Token
options.description: Your Personal API Token.  Profile Icon -> Manage your account -> Personal API token

options.name: Repository Names
options.description: A comma delimited list of Falcon LogScale repositories you want to search. To view your repositories click the Falcon Icon in the upper left of the dashboard.

options.name: LogScale Query
options.description: The query string that will be used to get log data from across the repositories that were entered in the 'Repositories' user option. The default is: "{{ENTITY}}" | tail(10), this will return the 10 latest logs.

options.name: Start of Search Window
options.description: How far back you wish to return logs from. #years, #months, #days, or #hours. This option defaults to `7days`.
